name: iexec-market-watcher
description: watch iexec contract to keep off-chain orderbook up to date

scripts.test: npm run test-token && npm run test-native
scripts.test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && CHAIN=TOKEN CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:8545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://localhost:8546 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest watcher-common --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && CHAIN=NATIVE IS_NATIVE=true CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca ETH_RPC_HOST=http://localhost:18545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://localhost:18546 MONGO_HOST=localhost REDIS_HOST=localhost NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest watcher-common --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.ci-test-token: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON TOKEN CHAIN' && CHAIN=TOKEN CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-token:8545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://chain-token:8546 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest watcher-common --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
scripts.ci-test-native: echo 'RUNNING TESTS ON NATIVE CHAIN' && CHAIN=NATIVE IS_NATIVE=true CHAIN_ID=65535 IEXEC_ADDRESS=0xC129e7917b7c7DeDfAa5Fff1FB18d5D7050fE8ca ETH_RPC_HOST=http://chain-native:8545 ETH_WS_HOST=http://chain-native:8546 MONGO_HOST=mongo REDIS_HOST=redis NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest watcher-common --runInBand --forceExit --detectOpenHandles --coverage
